document_data.mainbody:
The Chuen were a small, traditionalist Shou society based in the Xiousing district of Marsember.  Their name literally meant "The Pure".Dan Anderson. "Backdrop Xiousing." Dungeon #195. Renton, WA Wizards of the Coast, October 2011.  
The Chuens beliefs bordered on xenophobia and members had a strong dislike of non-Shou.  Members ran Shou-only businesses and harassed native Marsembans who visited Xiousing.  The Chuen wrongly believed Duc-Sum Li established Xiousing to bring about Shou dominance of Cormyr.
